Event history object

Source: R/event.r
Event.Rd

Constructur for Event History objects

Event(time, time2 = TRUE, cause = NULL, cens.code = 0, ...)

Arguments

time

Time

time2

Time 2

cause

Cause

cens.code

Censoring code (default 0)

...

Additional arguments

Value

Object of class Event (a matrix)

Details

... content for details

Author

Klaus K. Holst and Thomas Scheike

Examples


  t1 <- 1:10
  t2 <- t1+runif(10)
  ca <- rbinom(10,2,0.4)
  (x <- Event(t1,t2,ca))
#>       entry      exit cause
#>  [1,]     1  1.916763     1
#>  [2,]     2  2.387990     1
#>  [3,]     3  3.661774     2

#>  [6,]     6  6.475493     1

#> [10,]    10 10.128726     1
